Description: PLEASE READ AND UNDERSTAND ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE BUYING This is an "as is" sale with no warranty implied or given. All sales are final. No returns accepted. Please ask any and all questions before buying. 2018 Epiphone Les Paul ES PRO & Epiphone Hardshell Case For your consideration I am selling a 2018 Epiphone Les Paul ES PRO electric guitar. Serial number 18011507077. Hand crafted in China. Included with the guitar is an Epiphone Hardshell Case. Go to the link below to get info and specs : http://www.epiphone.com/Products/Les-Paul/Les-Paul-ES-PRO.aspx Check out Youtube.com for video demo's I checked the serial number on guitardaterproject.org. Info below: Your guitar was made at the Qingdao Plant (Epiphone), China on January, 2018 Production Number: 07077 About This Guitar & Case: This 2018 Epiphone Les Paul ES PRO is in near mint condition. Since I am not the original owner I am forced to list it as used here on Ebay. It has next to no play time on it. No wear of any kind. Still has the retail stickers on it. The Trans Black finish is really awsome. Hard to find too. I only played it maybe 20 minutes just to check it out. Neck is really nice. Action is on the low side but a set up will get it to your specs. Pick ups are great and they can be coil split !!! Real nice feature on this axe. The hollowbody makes it easy to play. Much lighter than expected. I give this guitar a 9.5 out of 10. Great guitar at a great price !!! Case FYI... The Epiphone Hardshell Case that comes with the guitar is in very good condition and includes 1 key for the locking latch. There are a couple of spots on the plush lining where the fur is matted down. To me it looks like glue from the factory. It is not bad but I like to disclose any issues. It does not affect how the guitar lays in the case. Other than that the case looks almost brand new. DISCLAIMER ***Important Information about this listing. Please read carefully BEFORE BUYING*** YOUR SUBMISSION OF A BID OR BUYING CONSTITUTES YOUR EXPRESS ACCEPTANCE OF ALL TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH BELOW. By bidding or buying on Ebay, you are entering into a legally binding agreement. Please ask all questions BEFORE placing a bid or buying. The seller will provide what information is available for the item(s) in this listing. If you don't live in the 48 Continental United States PLEASE DO NOT TRY TO BUY THIS ITEM !!! Sorry to all Ebayers in Hawaii, Alaska & all other US held territories . You must have a PayPal account. Payment must be made within 24 hours of winning the auction. The seller reserves the right to re list the item(s) after 24 hours with no payment. The seller will ship the item(s) in this listing after the payment clears the sellers PayPal account. Item(s) in this listing are sold : AS-IS with NO WARRANTY IMPLIED OR GIVEN ALL SALES ARE FINAL NO RETURNS NO REFUNDS **Packaging, handling,shipping and insurance will be FREE** The seller reserves the right to ship by Fed Ex GROUND SERVICE ONLY!!!** A Fed Ex Tracking Number will be emailed to the buyer after the package is shipped. Any damage,loss,or partial loss during shipping is not the responsibilty of the seller of this item. Th seller will provide any information available to help you resolve a dispute with Fed Ex. **The buyer will have to create an account with FED EX and file a claim as RECIPIENT** The seller will ONLY SHIP TO A CONFIRMED PAYPAL ADDRESS ( NO PO BOXES OR APO ) The seller has done their best to describe and show in pictures the condition of this item. The guitar stands in the pictures are not included in this sale. Check this sellers feedback and buy with confidence. Thanks for looking and happy Ebaying !!!!!
Title: ****2018 Epiphone Les Paul ES Pro Electric Guitar & Epiphone Hardshell Case****
